DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate prolong speed injection spinal anaesthesia reduce incidence hypotension and/or medication requirement thereby make safe mother foetus .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Different Injection Speeds Spinal Anaesthesia Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: We plan investigate vary speed injection spinal anaesthesia , difference incidence hypotension . Hypotension common complication especially pregnant woman undergo caesarean section . A high speed injection theoretically cause high spread anaesthetic , may increase incidence hypotension . We want know prolong injection time , lead reduction rate hypotension .
DOC.criteria: least 18 year age singleton term pregnancy American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) class III Severe preeclampsia contraindication spinal anaesthesia Height < 150cm > 180cm Weight â‰¥100kg Baseline systolic BP < 90 mmHg Baseline systolic BP > 150mmHg Category 1 urgency delivery
